Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Danielle K:
five star review by 
Delicious! The Dazed and Confused and Almost Legal rice bowls were amazing, so flavorful and good that we went back the next night! The brussels sprouts were also really good! Looking forward to making this place our go to place for delicious meals!

Review by - Google

Ruth W:
five star review by 
This place has a nice ambiance very eclectic. Ordered the queso with house chips, almost legal, and dazed and confused. The chicken was delicious, and everything was perfectly seasoned. Will definitely be going back.

Review by - Google

Jill B:
five star review by 
What a clean and upbeat restaurant this was! The Span-ish chop bowl was amazingly full of flavors and very filling! The specialty fish taco was delicious! Can't wait to return!
